price: 84. Et pourquoi ne croirions-nous pas en Allah et en la vérité qui nous est parvenue, et ne désirerions-nous pas que notre Seigneur nous admette au nombre des vertueux ? »
arabic: وَمَا لَنَا لَا نُؤۡمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَمَا جَآءَنَا مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَنَطۡمَعُ أَن يُدۡخِلَنَا رَبُّنَا مَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā lanā lā nu'minu bil-lahi wamā jāanā mina al-ḥaqi wanaṭmaʿu an yud'khilanā rabbunā maʿa al-qawmi al-ṣāliḥīna
